title: FETCH TECHNOLOGY - Junior PHP Developer (Magento) - HN/HCM - FT
body:
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/60914247/90873541-830f3e00-e3c8-11ea-8c99-893e78cda1a8.png)

## HN/HCM

## 1,000 - 1,300 USD

## Requirements
* Hands-on experience in networking security, databases and cloud systems. 
* Degree level or equivalent in IT/Computer Science, or Magento certification.
* Minimum 1 year’s experience on the Magento platform. 

## Responsibilities
Our Backend Engineer will focus on creating, refining and perfecting these platforms through his skillbook of JavaScript, HTML, CSS, PHP, MySQL, Joomla, and Magento and your solid knowledge and experience in programming applications.

The most important characteristic of our Backend Engineer is a ninja sense for opportunities - and identifying, developing and implementing changes and enhancements for site infrastructure, on-page optimisation and site performance at lightning speed. Our Backend Engineer is also well-versed in various languages like English, programming and scripting. Your fashionable sense of modern UI/UX trends and wide knowledge in operating system administration, cloud platform deployment and networking protocols makes you the go-to guy for our marketing team to resolve issues together. Mummys Market is a place for people to work better and grow together. Our job is to help mothers, and to support our people to do their best so that they can continue serving mothers their best. 

Our Backend Engineer is able to adapt like a chameleon, communicate and accept ideas clearly, with a keen sense of accuracy, quality, and responsiveness. Your success is measured in swiftness, efficiency, clarity, accountability and the lines of love and code poured into each platform. 

You’re good at: 

* Working hard and fast.
* Magento Module customisation, cache implementation (REST/SOAP).
* Understanding code structure, extension architecture, theming hierarchy and fallback components.

## Why it would be awesome to work with us ?
* Onsite Singapore opportunity.
* Attractive salary and annual salary review.
* Working in a professional, friendly, well-equipped environment both with foreigners and Vietnamese.
* Extensive on job training, you will always have chance to work with new emerging technologies.
* Full social insurance, health insurance & unemployment insurance according to Vietnam Labor Law.
* 12-day annual leave per year.
* 13th month salary.
* Enjoy diversified activities: Happy time every day, Monthly Team-building, Company trip, Play Game (PlayStation, CS Go), Play Sport (Football, Badminton...). 

### Contact
Mail: trangdong@fetch.tech
Skype: trangdong0111@gmail.com

title: Yojee - Product Manager - Saigon, District 4 - FT
body:
## Location

* District 4, Saigon, Vietnam

## Salary Expectation

* VND 50m - VND 80m gross per month

## About the role

Yojee is looking for a Product Manager that enjoys working in a dynamic startup and will be responsible for delivering world class logistics services across the globe. The ability to work with product managers and ensuring engineering hits deadlines and deliverables is something you take pride in. Together with the team, you will have full ownership of the services you build.

## Requirements

* Bachelor Degree in Computer Science or related technical field preferred.
* 3-6 years of working experience; 1 year or more of product management experience preferred.
* Strong communication skills and ability to understand perspectives of different users and prioritize needs.
* Analytical problem-solver, detail-oriented and self-driven.
* Fast-learner, comfortable in leading independently without much supervision in a fast-paced environment.
* Domain knowledge of our market.
* Some experience in quality assurance and continuous improvement processes.

## Responsibilities

* Lead and oversee one or more products in Yojee.
* Lead the strategy and development of products, and oversee their lifecycle from ideation to release, and then ongoing developments and improvements.
* Identify and fill product gaps and generate new ideas, improve customer experience and drive growth.
* Scope and prioritize activities based on business and customer impact.
* Translate product strategies into detailed requirements and prototypes.
* Coordinate, schedule and work closely with engineering teams and executives to serve the needs of the business and to optimize the utilization of development resources.
* Perform and handle other ad-hoc duties as required.

### Reporting Structure - Who Will Help You Win

* This role will be located in Vietnam and will report to the Senior Product Manager.

## Why it would be awesome to work with us

We are not a startup although the company structure is organized in such a way. Yojee is a public listed company on Australian stock exchange (ASX: YOJ). We are growing our team in Vietnam which is developing our core product. Don't miss this opportunity to join us early.

* Company stock
* Provided Macbook pro
* Occasional onsite trip to Singapore, Indonesia
* International environment : Australia, India, Singapore, Indonesia, Vietnam,..


## About Yojee

Yojee Limited (ASX: YOJ) is a cloud based (SaaS) logistics platform that seamlessly and uniquely manages, tracks and optimizes freight movements along the entire logistics chain, from sender to end customer, across borders and between logistics providers (land, sea, air), with subcontractors and for multi-leg journeys. Rarely is a single carrier servicing an entire goods journey from sender to end customer, or exclusively using one type of transportation method. Yojee ensures connectivity and more efficient planning along the entire journey.

### About the Product team at Yojee

Yojee Product team comes up with the best strategy for product features and roadmap to solve on-ground logistics problems. We are accountable for the entire product lifecycle, right from planning through development, go-live, and retirement phases


### How to apply

Please apply [here ](https://yojee.bamboohr.com/jobs/view.php?id=53&source=Github) if you are interested in. 

### Contact
Homepage: Yojee.com
Lily: lily@yojee.com

title: Yojee - Senior Solutions Engineer - Saigon, District 4 - FT
body:
## Location

* District 4, Saigon, Vietnam

## Salary Expectation

* VND 50m - VND 80m gross per month

## About the role

Yojee is looking for a Senior Solutions Engineer who enjoys developing and designing backend services in a cloud platform environment focusing on system integrations. Together with the team, you will have ownership of the services you build, and you love to share your ideas regarding architecture and functionality.

## Requirements

* Minimum Bachelor Degree in Computer Engineering or its equivalent related experience.
* 4+ years of various complex systems.
* Experienced and proficient working with at least two languages, preferably Elixir, Ruby, Go or any functional programming language.
* Experienced with System Integrations.
* Design, develop and execute software solutions to address business issues.
* Troubleshoot code level problems quickly and efficiently.
* You enjoy driving things over getting tasks assigned.
* Attention to detail and reliability are what you take pride in.
* Excellent communication and collaboration skill.
 
### Nice to have

* Experience with Microservice architecture.
* js, Angular.js, React.js or React native.
* DevOps experience with Heroku, AWS or Azure, Docker.
* Production experience with Elixir & Phoenix. 
* Open source repositories and contributions.

## Responsibilities

* Design and implement API endpoints for the Yojee API backend in Elixir.
* Participate in the Scrum process as part of the team.
* Take part in grooming meetings & provide input on how to solve requirements and build great architecture.
* Take ownership of the systems the team is responsible for and participate in their development were necessary.
* Follow best practices and produce high quality code.
* Maintain and improve existing Elixir code bases.
* May be required to perform other related duties as required.

### Reporting Structure - Who Will Help You Win

* This role will be located in Vietnam and will report to the VP of Engineering (Platform).


## Why it would be awesome to work with us

We are not a startup although the company structure is organized in such a way. Yojee is a public listed company on Australian stock exchange (ASX: YOJ). We are growing our team in Vietnam which is developing our core product. Don't miss this opportunity to join us early.

* Company stock
* Provided Macbook pro
* Occasional onsite trip to Singapore, Indonesia
* International environment : Australia, India, Singapore, Indonesia, Vietnam,..


## About Yojee

Yojee Limited (ASX: YOJ) is a cloud based (SaaS) logistics platform that seamlessly and uniquely manages, tracks and optimizes freight movements along the entire logistics chain, from sender to end customer, across borders and between logistics providers (land, sea, air), with subcontractors and for multi-leg journeys. Rarely is a single carrier servicing an entire goods journey from sender to end customer, or exclusively using one type of transportation method. Yojee ensures connectivity and more efficient planning along the entire journey.

### About the Engineering team at Yojee

The backbone of Yojee focused on building the core platform and product using best in class technology. We love clean code, well-designed architecture and applying best practices.  We build cool technology that lasts long and scales well.

### How to apply

Please apply [here ](https://yojee.bamboohr.com/jobs/view.php?id=72&source=Github) if you are interested in. 

### Contact
Homepage: Yojee.com
Lily: lily@yojee.com

title: Spiderbox Design - Full Stack Senior Developer (Rails + Angular) - Saigon - FT
body:
## Location

* Saigon, Vietnam

## Salary Expectation

* Up to $2000/month

## Requirements

* Over 2 years working experience with Angular and ROR. 
* Good understanding of asynchronous request handling, partial page updates, and AJAX. 
* Proficient understanding of code versioning tools, such as Git 
* Familiar with asynchronous programming, ES6, typescript
* Clear communication skills for reporting needs and answering technical and service questions 
* Experience working in an agile development environment

### Ideally

* ROR Backend experience 
* Familiar with CI/CD 
* Familiar with TDD/BDD 
* Quality English communication & experience
* Experience working with foreign companies, in particular Australia 
* Experience working in a fast paced agile team 
* Is available to travel to Australia where required

### Responsibilities
Full Stack Senior Developer will be part of a fast growing team of developers to support a range of front end and back end projects for a large Australian client. You will be working with a small team of senior developers and QA initially to build velocity and support as a foundation team developing the front end to support a range of products for the Australian Utility Industry. We work within an Agile SCRUM methodology.

* Report directly to team leader-Develop highly-responsive, web-based user interface components and modules using Angualr. 
* Ability to work in an agile environment and Iterate quickly based on customer and internal feedback. 
* Constantly learn and keep abreast of emerging technologies. 
* Accurate estimation and delivery of  deadlines 
* Support the QA process and ensure client delivery is 100% tested and stable

### Why it would be awesome to work with us

Based in Melbourne, Seattle and Saigon, Spiderbox Design is a fast growing, small software firm that develops for clients as an agency as well as internal self owned/funded software.

We value and understand the importance of our team and their happiness and career ambitions. It is important to Spiderbox that our staff are not only happy but are provided the opportunity to continue to grow, learn and improve their expertise and skills.

With a nothing is impossible attitude, Spiderbox Design has grown and worked across a range of challenging and exciting full stack projects and apps.

* Competitive and attractive salary 
* New Computer (Mac/PC) that fits your need. 
* Comfortable work environment. 
* A conveniently located in D3 office. 
* International, dynamic, friendly working environment. 
* Annual performance review: recognize your efforts and identify development/ improvement needs 
* Clear KPI’s and expectations.


### Contact
Homepage: https://spiderbox.design
Don Nguyen: don@spiderbox.design

title: Agency Revolution - Dev Team Lead (.NET) - Saigon -  FT
body:
## Location

* Saigon, Vietnam

## Salary Expectation

* $2,200+

## Job Description

You are a catalyst and respected among your peers. With you on the team, everyone is the best version of themselves. People around you work hard, but to them, it doesn’t feel like work. You understand the other team members and elevate them. You try to understand first, then try to be understood. You are a clear writer and a sharp thinker. You have a passion for technology and growth. 

You are an excellent proactive communicator who has the willingness and ability to accommodate different time zones, including direct communication with US teams on a weekly basis. You are experienced in influencing others to make decisions and taking extreme ownership of everything related to your allocated departmental processes. 

You will be the coach of a team full-stack engineers and quality assurance engineers for a US-based product team. You will report to the product manager and have a direct connection with the US-based Director of Engineering - an amazing person. You will be coding and designing systems, and guiding the team to success. You test your work and follow the YBIYRUYFI principle (you build it, you run it, you fix it). When you send something to QA, it's for the seal of approval, not to test your work.


## How to know if you're a good fit

### Qualificatons

- 5+ years experience as a full-stack engineer designing, coding, deploying, troubleshooting and maintaining web applications
- Experience with SQL and schemaless databases.
- Knowledge of multiple back-end languages (e.g., C#, Java, Python) and JavaScript frameworks (e.g., React, Angular, Vue)
- Excellent ability to solve open-ended problems in an elegant, scalable manner; critical thinker
- Strong interpersonal skills with the ability to work in teams and independently
- Great communication, attention to detail, and a strong teamwork ethic

### Personality

- “People person” who loves to help others grow
- Enjoy challenging conversations and guiding progress in others
- System oriented - not afraid to run reports, gather the facts and follow a dynamic process
- Patient listener, never interrupting and always showing empathy.
- Make people feel safe sharing their opinions
- Servant leadership - prefers to guide people to success rather than give orders
- Growth mindset orientation over a fixed mindset

### Preferred Qualifications

- A bachelor’s degree in Computer Science/Information Technology or equivalent;
- A strong DevOps mindset, experience with shell scripting and automation tools, like Ansible.
- Experience with big data and time-series data.
- Experience building software in a microservices environment


## Responsibilities

- Work with teams to collaboratively design, implement and release new features and products on the platform
- Work regularly with the US-based engineering leadership team on best practices and guiding the team to success
- Stay abreast of our product domain so you can innovate and collaborate with our product team. 
- Understand all parts of a project and identify risks so that the team can mitigate them
- Communicate project status to stakeholders, ensure that internal systems are up to date
- Manage the technical debt and refactor aging architecture when it drags the team down.

## Why work at FMG Suite?

- Why work at FMG Suite?
- We’re a US-based product company - and growing
- 12 days annual leave provided per year (not including holidays)
- Up to 30 days per year for long term employees
- A bonus day off for your Birthday
- Flexible working hours (40h/week)
- Optional work-from-home two days per week
- Professional equipment - Laptop + 2 screens
- Premium health insurance for you and your spouse (husband or wife)
- 13th-month salary, including probation time
-

### Contact
More about us: www.fmgsuite.com and www.agencyrevolution.com
To apply, email lucas.jans@fmgsuite.com

title: Orange Logic - Software Engineering Intern - HCMC - FT
body:
## Location

* HCMC, Vietnam

## Salary Offer

* $1000

## Requirements

* Currently enrolled in a Bachelor / Master degree  in **Computer science / Software engineering** or equivalent
* Excellent academic grades / Top of the class 


## Skills

* Experience with data structures or Algorithms (from university, an internship, hobby or other practical experience)
* Coding experience in one of the following languages: .NET / C# / Java 
* A good command of English both verbal and written

### Must Have

* Strong **self-discipline** and the capability for **rational thinking**.
* Be able to work ** full-time**, for **12-14 consecutive weeks**, starting in **September 2020**

### The opportunity

Our **selective** internship program is an opportunity to gain hands-on experience as a software engineer, understand further the **software production** principles, and discover the business of an editor, along with its unique **company culture**
 
Specifically, as an intern, you will:

- Work in teams to deliver concrete projects for our prestigious clients (Airbnb, BBC, Reuters…) 
- Complete learnings (training, lectures, graded assignments) organized for you in our office
- Learn about our company & its DAM product, and contribute to its development and good reputation

Depending on your achievements, you may be offered a **permanent position** at Orange Logic.

### Why it would be awesome to work with us

* Work alongside a group of skilled engineers, share and contribute their ideas, and have a direct impact on our software development. At Orange Logic, it does not matter how many years of experience you have, or your age. We believe that each individual, regardless of these factors, has the ability to evoke change within the organization.
* Amazing team: smart, open-mind, and passionate engineers. They came from the US, France, UK, and Vietnam hence you could improve your English and explore different country cultures
* 18 days of annual leave (cashback for unused days) + 4 days for an abroad company trip (Taiwan, Thailand, etc)
* 13th-month salary no matter when you join the team
* Performance bonus (average $700/month in 2020)
* Monthly team outing activity
* Premium healthcare insurance ($10.000 cover) after probation
* Full Insurance based on your Gross salary
* Allowances for lunch, gym, parking ($100)
* Birthday bonus ($100), Tet gift, etc
* Daily free snacks, fresh fruit, coffee & soft drinks
* Latest gadgets for work (include noise-canceling headphones)

### Contact
Please send your resume and transcript to ha.nguyen@orangelogic.com
You can drop me a message on [Skype](https://join.skype.com/invite/mNKg28GbjKfr) or [Linkedin](https://www.linkedin.com/in/ha-nguyen-01a752ba/)
[Our Homepage ](https://www.orangelogic.com/digital-asset-management-customer-examples)

> Can't wait to have a detailed discussion if you have any questions or concerns!

title: Raksul Vietnam - Senior / Lead VueJS Frontend Engineer - HCMC - FT
body:
## Location
* HCMC, Vietnam

## Salary
* 2,000 - 4,000 USD

## TOP 3 BENEFITS
1. High impact product
2. Talented system engineers
3. International colleagues


## We are looking to hire candidates for the following responsibilities
* Act as the bridge between engineering teams in Japan and Vietnam
* Partner with business teams in Japan to understand business requirements
* Provide assistance and advice on the definition of system requirement and system design
* Provide guidance and mentoring to junior members


## Requirements
### Must Have
* Working experience in front-end frameworks (fluent in at least 1 of the following: Vue.js, Angular, React)
* Experience in development using Git with a team
* Experience as a team leader and a reviewer
* Ability to communicate fluently in at least two of the following languages: Vietnamese, English and Japanese

### Nice-to-have
* Experience in front-end development using TypeScript, FlowType, etc.
* Experience in designing and tuning UI interaction using CSS animation.
* Experience in build front-end development environment using Webpack, Gulp, etc.
* Experience in improving legacy code/system and working with REST API
* Experience in pair programming and/or mob programming
* Experience in working with cloud computing such as AWS

### Other important factors
* Ability to contribute to the expansion of the Vietnam (HCMC) development team
* Ability to work with others and preference on teamwork
* Proactively think and speak-up
* High interest in learning and using new technology
* Ability to define service issues or technical issues and proactively solve them
* Strong interest to change old industries with technology


## WHY YOU'LL LOVE WORKING HERE
### Excellent environment
* Flexible working time
* "Hackweek", one week hackathon in every year. Try new technology to build any product by your idea in a small team
* Weekly tech meetup hour to share own knowledge
* MacBook Pro/Air provided

### Competitive salary
* Salary reviews every 6 months
* Two times bonus in a year
* Health insurance

### Many other benefit
* Monthly team building lunch or dinner
* At least 15 paid days off per year.
* A 40-hour regular work week with little or no after-hours work requirements


### Contact
Homepage: https://corp.raksul.com/en/
Email: vietnam-hr-uc@raksul.com

Other: 
https://itviec.com/companies/raksul-inc

title: FETCH - Devops Engineer - HCM/HN - FT
body:
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/60914247/88765844-5721e380-d1a1-11ea-8d05-2b0d7819377a.png)

## HCM/HN

## 1,200 - 1,500 USD

## Requirements
* 3+ years of experience in DevOps and related work.
* Experience on operating Amazon AWS Cloud (Elastic BeanStalk, EC2, VPC, VPN, EBS, S3, Route53, IAM, AWS CLI etc).
* Experience with Continuous integration / continuous delivery: Jenkins.
* Experience with Linux operating system principles and network layer protocols.
* Environment & Configuration management: Linux/Unix (Ubuntu, RedHat), Windows, Shell Scripting.
* Strong analytical and problem-solving capabilities.
* Meticulous, good time management and able to work under pressure.
* Good communication skill, execution ability and strong sense of responsibility.
* Innovative and passionate in process optimization, operation and maintenance development.
* Familiar with Cloud Tech is a must - AWS.
* Familiarity with Google Cloud, Kubernetes, or Terraform is a plus.

## Responsibilities

* Ensure service availability, reliability, and scalability of the system.
* Promote and develop efficient automated operation and maintenance, management tools.
* Improve operation and maintenance efficiency by streamlining deployment processes for the different engineering teams.
* Set up, configure, automate, and maintain services in Linux environment.
* Write and deploy scripts, tools, services for service quality analysis, monitoring and operation.
* Re-engineer and document processes.
* Carefully assess and adopt new technologies and tools to improve efficiency.

## Why it would be awesome to work with us ?

* Onsite Singapore opportunity.
* Attractive salary and annual salary review,
* Working in a professional, friendly, well-equipped environment both with foreigners and Vietnamese.
* Extensive on job training, you will always have chance to work with new emerging technologies.
* Full social insurance, health insurance & unemployment insurance according to Vietnam Labor Law.
* 12-day annual leave per year.
* 13th month salary.
* Enjoy diversified activities: Happy time every day, Monthly Team-building, Company trip, Play Game (PlayStation, CS Go), Play Sport (Football, Badminton...).

## Contact
Mail: trangdong@fetch.tech
Skype: trangdong0111@gmail.com

title: A stealth startup - Software Engineer - Saigon - FT
body:
Our very early-stage startup is founded by 3 members who used to be the core members and Head of Engineering of a well-known startup in Sydney (hundred of millions in valuation).

We’re looking for exceptional people to join our team. The people who like to work with great engineers in town; have the chance to learn from them and believe that we can accomplish so much more together than apart.

## Location

* Saigon, Vietnam

## Salary Expectation

* $500-700 USD/month

## Requirements
We are always looking for great people to join our team. Above specific skills for the specific role, we're looking for candidates who share the following traits: 

- Performance-minded, able to listen hard and change fast
- A lifelong learner who is able to learn rapidly and eagerly
- You take smart risks
- You maintain calm poise in stressful situations
- Honesty & Humility

We are doing React-native (ReasonML), Ruby/Elixir daily. But, we’re more interested in how you think and learn than what you already know. If you don't know them, your capability and willingness to learn is enough. You have the chance to be trained by our best engineers.

### Responsibilities

* Help us build features and apps that people love to use
* Make your coworkers laugh

### Why it would be awesome to work with us

Our office, our team size is small now, but our dream, our passion is real big.

At Camelo, we are true believers in how important it is to make it is easy to collaborate people work and to have better work achievement together. We spend our days building a product we love, the mobile app for helping non-desk workers.

Our team culture speaks for itself. You will surround yourself with smart, humble, and humorous coworkers. 

If you are looking for a challenging workplace where you can use/develop your talents for something big and meaningful then Camelo could be the place for you. 

Be a part of something amazing that starts with you.


-----

FYI, here is a snapshot of the benefits & perks

- Company equity
- Macbook
- Snacks and drinks
- Unlimited paid time off (no approval needed)
- Flexible working hours (self-management)
- Team bonding activities: Swimming, Gym and play poker


### Contact

Tien Le: tienlx at g mail dot com

![88505611-2a839580-d002-11ea-9963-84f9beaaf247-min](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/190798/88506137-78e56400-d003-11ea-8d2e-b085e43458be.png)

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/190798/88505475-c1038700-d001-11ea-9f2a-079bb0c4ad94.png)

title: Uiza - Techical Writer (Fresh/Junior/Senior) - HCM - FT
body:
## Location

* Saigon, Vietnam
* Remote/Full-time/Part-time

## Salary Expectation

* Negotiate

## Requirements

* A strong fundamental understanding of the software development cycle.
* Proven skill in a technical domain or in a technical writing role (for mid-level).
* You are proficient in the Google suite and pick up new software easily.
* You’ve experience working with live streaming software such as OBS, Streamlabs…


## Skills

* English (IELTS >=5.0) is a plus.
* Strong written and email etiquette skills as well as oral communication skills, including the ability to present technical information in user-friendly language.
* Experience using tools to create, manage, and publish documentation. 


### Responsibilities

Our technical writers ensure that Uiza products are clearly described in documentation that is accurate and useful.
Create conceptual information:
* Create Step-by-step procedures
* Write out API descriptions and example commands
* Be one of the first to try new features as you work with developers and designers to improve the related user experience, UI text, error messages, and API design
* Interact directly with customers and use their feedback to improve the documentation dynamically, then update and publish your documentation on demand

### You can bring

* Love and passion for helping customers and delivering satisfaction even when faced with difficult customers.
* A good team player, willing to share with others and work together.

### Why it would be awesome to work with us
At Uiza, we believe that video will make a huge impact on the world that we are living in and shift it along with its technologies in a new direction. That is the reason why we carry a mission of making video universally accessible by building a Universal Streaming Operating System that could power all videos. We have been serving developers and their audiences in 180 countries in the world in a wide-range of use-cases.

Uiza is committed to each employee’s growth, learning, development and entire employee experience. We restlessly promote a growth mindset, innovation, transparency and commitment because we know that our vision is only achieved when our team members succeed. We want you and your ideas to thrive at Uiza. Come join us.


### Send CV and Contact
Mail: linhnht@uiza.io
Our website: https://uiza.io/

title: Orange Logic - Software Engineer - Saigon - FT
body:
## Location

* HCMC, Vietnam

## Salary Expectation

* $2000+/ Negotiate

## Requirements

* Proficiency with English, both verbal and written
* A strong fundamental understanding of software development.
* An understanding of complex algorithms and data structures, as well as a passion for intellectual challenges.

## Skills

* Backend skills: A solid problem-solving skill with well-practiced and consistent approach. You will have a chance to tackle any problems by breaking it down and solving it logically and systematically. We're open to all programming languages!
* Practical experience on a web-based application is a plus
* Experience with the database management tool SQL is a plus.

### Must Have

* Strong self-discipline for delivering well-tested, complete features/modules under a tight schedule and the capability for rational thinking.

### You’ll be responsible for

* Taking ownership of projects and having the opportunity to further your knowledge by exploring web application development, machine learning, security, DevOps, and more.
* Developing scalable new features for our software product that exceeds our customer’s needs.
* Building architecture for our platform to ensure optimal performance.
* Obtaining requirement feedback from internal teams/clients to maintain/support product development.
* Write the Unit Tests for robust development.
* Performing code reviews on other team member’s work.

### Why it would be awesome to work with us

* Work alongside a group of skilled engineers, share and contribute their ideas, and have a direct impact on our software development. At Orange Logic, it does not matter how many years of experience you have, or your age. We believe that each individual, regardless of these factors, has the ability to evoke change within the organization.
* Amazing team: smart, open-mind, and passionate engineers. They came from the US, France, UK, and Vietnam hence you could improve your English and explore different country cultures.
* 18 days of annual leave (cashback for unused days) + 4 days for an abroad company trip (Taiwan, Thailand, etc)
* 13th-month salary no matter when you join the team
* Performance bonus (average $700/month in 2020)
* Monthly team outing activity
* Premium healthcare insurance ($10.000 cover) after probation
* Full Insurance based on your Gross salary
* Allowances for lunch, gym, parking ($100)
* Birthday bonus ($100), Tet gift, etc
* Daily free snacks, fresh fruit, coffee & soft drinks
* Latest gadgets for work (include noise-canceling headphones)

### Contact
* Please send your resume to ha.nguyen@orangelogic.com
* You can drop me a message on [Skype](https://join.skype.com/invite/mNKg28GbjKfr) or [Linkedin](https://www.linkedin.com/in/ha-nguyen-01a752ba/)
* [Our Homepage ](https://www.orangelogic.com/digital-asset-management-customer-examples)

> Can't wait to have a detailed discussion if you have any questions or concerns!

title: Fetch - Backend Developer (Python) - HCM - FT
body:
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/60914247/87907786-6ad99580-ca8f-11ea-8a42-c6e372f0e56b.png)

#  HCM 

# 1,000 - 1,500 USD

## Requirements
* 1 to 3 years of experience in developing, testing, debugging, and troubleshooting with any of these programming languages: Python (prefer), Node.js, and Golang. Especially for building backend services.
* Highly skilled in developing, testing, debugging, and troubleshooting with any of these technologies: 
- Git, Git hooks, unit test frameworks.

- CI tools like CircleCI, Jenkins.

- Ubuntu VMs, Docker containers, and Kubernetes.

- Monitoring tools like Sentry, APM tools like Datadog.

- Log aggregators like Elasticsearch & Kibana.

- Provisioning tools like Ansible.

* Highly skilled in designing complex real world database structures and storing, managing, and analyzing large amounts of data in SQL.
* Highly skilled in all kinds of development tools that brings source code in a text file to running code in production.
* Experience in agile development processes and applications such as Jira.
* Computer Science/Engineering degree with 0 – 3 years of diverse software development experience and teams.
* Great team player, have excellent work ethics, and have solid technical communication skills in English.
Nice to have: Intermediate knowledge in web frontend development.

## Responsibilities

* Analyze and systematically approach product requirements and work closely with PMs, QAs, and Tech Leads to build business backend features/apps that are modular and reusable. 
* Come up with practical short and long term solutions that minimize complexity and maximize value Include security, maintainability, reusability, and testability when developing software solutions and code reviewing. 
* Factor Linux/Unix OS system internals, data storage, computing resources, microservices in the produced software architecture. 
* Identify things that can go wrong early but also thoroughly investigate bugs reported in production.
* Apply and tailor software development concepts and best practices.

## Why it would be awesome to work with us ?

* Working in a professional, friendly, well-equipped environment both with foreigners and Vietnamese.
* Extensive on job training, you will always have chance to work with new emerging technologies.
* Full social insurance, health insurance & unemployment insurance according to Vietnam Labor Law.
* PVI Health Care.
* 12-day annual leave per year.
* 13th month salary.
* Enjoy diversified activities: Weekly and Monthly Team-building, Company trip, Play Game (PlayStation, CS Go), Play Sport (Football, Badminton...).  

## Contact:

title: CodeLink - Java backend developer - HCMC - FT
body:
![CodeLink Year-end Party](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/122055/73826276-17042880-4830-11ea-99d8-1495c6362e94.jpg)

## Location

We are conveniently located beside the Zoo on Xo Viet Nghe Tinh, at the border of District 1 and  Binh Thanh, with easy access for all districts and a plentiful amount of awesome food and great coffee shops around the office.

## Salary Expectation
* $1000+

## About us

CodeLink is an innovative and design-focused development studio made up of an international mix of Designers and Developers. Our main stacks are Rails, Java, Golang, NodeJS and ReactJS. We have built products in different industries, including Finance, Education, Entertainment, HR, etc for clients ranging from start-ups such as CryptoKitties to big companies such as Air Asia and Electronic Arts.

We are building an environment where personal development is a focus. We want all members to grow with the company through hands-on projects and industry best practices. Our clients have extremely high expectations and that sets a bar for our quality of work.

Our engineers work directly with international teams from Canada, US (Silicon Valley, Boston), Germany and other well-developed tech scenes. We have learned a lot from them, and vice versa. 

We are willing to adopt new but proven technologies provided that they bring business values to our clients and learning opportunities for our engineers. We have our freedom to choose and recommend what solutions are best for a certain project.

We are looking for a Java Developer who has a solid technical background to work on an asset management platform for one of the biggest clothing / fashion companies in the world. A perfect candidate is someone with excellent fundamental knowledge about web development. We don't care too much about specific frameworks or languages, but we will be asking you a lot of questions about databases, performance, scalability, security etc. 

## Requirements

+ Require a minimum of 3+ years of Java experience.
+ Require a minimum of 2+ years of web development experience.
+ Require experience with jUnit and mock framework such as Mockito.
+ Require Git, Github and Pull Request knowledge.
+ Require experience with Service Oriented Architecture
+ Require experience with web technologies such as REST API, security, performance etc.
+ Excellent written and verbal communication skills in English.
+ Familiar with DAM (Digital Asset Management) systems.
+ Familiar with Docker, Openshift and Jenkins.
+ Familiar with relational database systems such as PostgreSQL and MySQL.
+ Familiar with deployment, scaling, monitoring and performance tuning.

## Responsibilities

+ Working with different stakeholders to design flexible and adaptive applications that can grow with the business needs
+ Researching new technologies to apply for different projects, such as a new web framework or a new development trend
+ Supervising and advising projects from an early stage to launch
+ Helping other teams and members to continuously improve their skills and productivity
+ Working on Web and Mobile products for a diverse range of Clients and industries
+ Working and pair programming with other developers to build applications with Go / Java / Rails / Node.js and React
+ Cooperating with UI Designer to implement modern minimalist designs into production
+ Contributing to the local Tech Ecosystem by mentoring, writing articles and joining events.

## How we work

We work with a true team mindset, with every member having equal say in how we run our projects, our technologies and our product decisions. We work as a tight and unified team, investing in the development of all members of our team and the furthering of their abilities. 

We focus on creating qualified software and on improving our engineers. You are required to write neat code and follow highly efficient workflow, but you are about to learn tons of new things along the way via pair programming, code review and mentorship. 

## Why you’ll love working with us

- Absolutely no overtime. We respect work-life balance. 
- We fully invest in our team, we will help you build yourself up in any area you feel you need development, be it in English, learning a new programming language, product understanding and more. We want to make sure that you’re always learning and developing yourself whilst a part of our team. 
- We respect both Product and Technology equally, ensuring all of the Products we work on have features with true market potential and ensuring all of the team contribute to, understand and believe in what they are developing. 
- We are very selective with our Clients, we only work on awesome Products we believe in and that show strong market potential. 
- We respect you and your personal hours, we keep sustainable pace by working standard 8 hour days from Monday to Friday, ensuring we only plan for what we can achieve. 
- We work fully Agile, and only work with Clients who work the same, working with set sprint goals and working at our rate of velocity. 

## Contact

Khac Anh: ka_at_codelink_dot_io

title: Koidra - Frontend Software Engineer - Saigon - FT
body: is looking for strong frontend+mobile engineers with a strong passion for web/app design, open source software stacks, and cloud computing. ## Location Saigon, Vietnam ## Salary Expectation $1500 - $2500/month ## Requirements ### Must Have - 2+ years of professional experience in frontend or full-stack development - Experience in TypeScript and familiarity with modern frontend libraries and tooling - Fluency in HTML, CSS, and related web technologies - Strong coding, debugging, optimization, and problem solving skills - Passion for and experience in using open source frameworks - Organized and self-sufficient - Obsessed with customer satisfaction ### Preferred Familiar with full-stack development can work on the backend when needed ### Ideally You fit our culture, explained in these core principles - **Customer obsession** Start with the customer and work backwards. Each of us must always understand our immediate customers, either internal or external. We always think customers first and work vigorously to earn and keep their trust. - **Start simple and continuously improve** It’s better to make small changes, improve/push/deploy continuously than to code until perfection. - **Insist on the highest standards** Koiers continually raise the bar and drive team members to deliver high quality products, services and processes. - **Bias for action** Speed matters in business. Many decisions and actions are reversible and do not need extensive study. We value calculated risk taking. - **Disagree and Commit** Koiers are obligated to respectfully challenge decisions when they disagree, even when doing so is uncomfortable or exhausting. Koiers have conviction and are tenacious. They do not compromise for the sake of social cohesion. However, once a decision is determined, they commit wholly. ## Responsibilities - Implement new and improve existing features for our web and mobile apps - Architect efficient and reusable front-end systems that drive complex applications - Identify and resolve performance and scalability issues - Collaborate with other software engineers and other key stakeholders to deliver compelling user-facing products ## Why it would be awesome to work with us Founded by Kenneth Tran, formerly a Principal Machine Learning Scientist at Microsoft Research (MSR), Koidra's mission is to change the industrial automation industry, applying cutting edge research in AI, IoT, and hybrid cloud+edge computing. Check out some early **[media coverage about us](https://www.notion.so/Press-Releases-354cdc2b6461476b98c2d01dfa1d22dc)**. At Koidra, you'll have an opportunity to work with world experts in Machine Learning and Software Engineering. **Other benefits** - Active and agile working environment; flexible time culture - An environment for you to be maximally productive - Opportunity to impact the company (and hence the global stage) in big ways ## Contact Kenneth Tran (CTO): ken@koidra.ai (0935069639 or WhatsApp: +15124363250)

title: Koidra - IoT Engineer - Saigon - FT
body: is a fullstack IoT-AI company, offering data-driven automation solutions for hi-tech greenhouses. We are looking for talented IoT & Automation engineers to help us change the world. The IoT & Automation engineers will be an integral part of our new Arduino-based `μControl` product that addresses the industry's digital integration barriers (more details in [this article](https://urbanagnews.com/blog/exclusives/when-will-artificial-intelligence-come-to-the-commercial-greenhouse-industry/)). ## Location Saigon, Vietnam ## Salary Expectation $1000 - $3000/month, depending on level ## Requirements ### Must Have - Bachelor Degree in Computer Engineering, Electrical Engineering, Industrial Automation, or related fields - 2+ year of professional experience in embedded programming - Operating systems programming experience (e.g. C/C++, Linux, etc.) - Experience with embedded IoT Device programming (Arduino, Raspberry Pi, etc.). - Knowledge of industrial control and protocol for networking and data acquisition of PLC (Programmable Logic Controllers) to SCADA (Supervisory Control and Data Acquisition) - Broad knowledge of electrical instrumentation and devices - Experience with installation and maintenance of process automation devices for data acquisition and monitoring (e.g. real-time and on-line) - Strong programming, debugging, and analytical skills - Experience with `git` ### Ideally You fit our culture, explained in these core principles - **Customer obsession** Start with the customer and work backwards. Each of us must always understand our immediate customers, either internal or external. We always think customers first and work vigorously to earn and keep their trust. - **Start simple and continuously improve** It’s better to make small changes, improve/push/deploy continuously than to code until perfection. - **Insist on the highest standards** Koiers continually raise the bar and drive team members to deliver high quality products, services and processes. - **Bias for action** Speed matters in business. Many decisions and actions are reversible and do not need extensive study. We value calculated risk taking. - **Disagree and Commit** Koiers are obligated to respectfully challenge decisions when they disagree, even when doing so is uncomfortable or exhausting. Koiers have conviction and are tenacious. They do not compromise for the sake of social cohesion. However, once a decision is determined, they commit wholly. ## Responsibilities - Design and implement the IoT OS for our Arduino-based PLC, ensuring scalability and easy integration - Implement adapters for connecting sensors/actuators to the IoT OS - Support development of software interfaces as between manufacturing machines and data repositories for advanced analytics - Deploy for our customers - Write clean, bug-free, and maintainable code - Coordinate cross-functionally to insure project meets business objectives and compliance standards ## Why it would be awesome to work with us Founded by Kenneth Tran, formerly a Principal Machine Learning Scientist at Microsoft Research (MSR), Koidra's mission is to change the industrial automation industry, applying cutting edge research in AI, IoT, and hybrid cloud+edge computing. Check out some early **[media coverage about us](https://www.notion.so/Press-Releases-354cdc2b6461476b98c2d01dfa1d22dc)**. At Koidra, you'll have an opportunity to work with world experts in Machine Learning and Software Engineering. **Other benefits** - Active and agile working environment; flexible time culture - An environment for you to be maximally productive - Opportunity to impact the company (and hence the global stage) in big ways ## Contact Kenneth Tran (CTO): ken@koidra.ai (0935069639 or WhatsApp: +15124363250)

title: Trobz - Odoo/ERP developers - HCM, Vietnam - FT

title: Nimble - Senior Android Developer - HCM/DN - FT
body:
## Location
You can choose one of our two locations:
* Ho Chi Minh city, Vietnam
* Da Nang, Vietnam

## Salary Expectation

* $1500-$3000/month

## Requirements

-   **5 or more years of professional Android development experience.** Experience in Kotlin is ideal. If you do not have experience in Kotlin,  you must be open to learn and work on it.
-   **Proven ability to lead large mobile projects end-to-end** from architecture to implementation and deployment.
-   Advanced experience in writing automated tests for mobile applications.
-   Enjoy working on challenging solutions and systems.
-   Believe that building great applications is not only about delivering code that “works”, but involves thinking about reusability, maintainability, security and performance.
-   A "Can do attitude" and a product mindset.
-   Confidence in communicating in English.
-   Due to COVID-19 and international travel restriction, we are able to process candidates who are currently residing in Vietnam only. If you are living outside of Vietnam, we will get in touch with you once the travel ban is lifted.

## Responsibilities

### You’ll be responsible for

-   You will have the **leading position** of the development team (2-3 developers) in a project squad working with a Product Owner and UX/UI Designer.
-   Decide which technologies are going to be used and define the overall architecture.
-   Work closely with the Product Owner to make sure the backlog is efficiently planned and occasionally assist in technical discussions with clients. Most of the client interfacing is done by the Product Owner.
-   Write clean, composable, and maintainable code as you develop world-class products for our clients.
-   Write automated tests to build and maintain the product we build for our clients.
-   Do code reviews with your squad members.
-   Learn new technologies, languages, and techniques so that you are able to adapt to the evolving needs of our clients.
-   Mentor junior members via pair-programming and sharing your knowledge through team rituals (sprint planning and bi-weekly retrospectives).
-   Collaborate with other team members to define the internal processes and initiatives to help the company accomplish its mission. [Our handbook](https://compass.nimblehq.co/) has been written by the whole team.

### Why it would be awesome to work with us
-   **You will be proud**  of any product that has our name on it.
-   We are an  **engineering-focused company**. Both co-founders are software engineers and led the tech teams at the most prominent e-commerce powerhouses in South East Asia.
-   We really pay attention and care about  **processes, high quality, and aesthetics**.
-   **Strong processes**. We not only believe but also really work following agile principles. Developers work on well-sized and well-defined user stories, do estimate using points and work iteratively in short sprints (1-2 weeks).
-   Regular one-on-one reviews to constantly  **improve and grow**. We have a clearly defined process for our developers to level up continuously not only their technical skills but also soft skills.
-   **The vast amount of learning resources**  (Pluralsight, Pragpub, Leanpub, (e-)books, etc.) and yearly education allowance to step up your game.
-   Private medical insurance (Liberty)  **from day one**, company care fund and social welfare coverage.
-   Great equipment consisting of a MacBook Pro, large screens, and any accessory to let you work comfortably. Our equipment is renewed every 3 years. If you already have a great laptop and wish to continue using, we will reimburse with a laptop allowance monthly.
-   Casual work attire for everyone.
-   Comfortable and modern office space environment in the heart of Ho Chi Minh city and Da Nang.
-   25 days of paid leaves/year (10 public holidays + 15 personal days).
-   Sabbatical month every 3 years.
-   Company outing every year.
-   Many more perks!
### Interesting engineering projects
Want to see what we have built? Check our [Dribbble](https://dribbble.com/nimblehq) and [Behance](https://www.behance.net/Nimblehq) accounts.
### Contact
Homepage: nimblehq.co
Contact: uyen@nimblehq.co (+84 989 781 874)

title: Nimble - Senior iOS Developer - HCM/DN - FT
body:

-   Enjoy working on challenging solutions and systems.
-   Believe that building great applications is not only about delivering code that “works”, but involves thinking about reusability, maintainability, security and performance.
-   A "Can do attitude" and a product mindset.
-   Confidence in communicating in English.
-   Due to COVID-19 and international travel restriction, we are able to process candidates who are currently residing in Vietnam only. If you are living outside of Vietnam, we will get in touch with you once the travel ban is lifted.

## Responsibilities

### You’ll be responsible for

-   You will have the **leading position** of the development team (2-3 developers) in a project squad working with a Product Owner and UX/UI Designer.
-   Decide which technologies are going to be used and define the overall architecture.
-   Work closely with the Product Owner to make sure the backlog is efficiently planned and occasionally assist in technical discussions with clients. Most of the client interfacing is done by the Product Owner.
-   Write clean, composable, and maintainable code as you develop world-class products for our clients.
-   Write automated tests to build and maintain the product we build for our clients.
-   Do code reviews with your squad members.
-   Learn new technologies, languages, and techniques so that you are able to adapt to the evolving needs of our clients.
-   Mentor junior members via pair-programming and sharing your knowledge through team rituals (sprint planning and bi-weekly retrospectives).
-   Collaborate with other team members to define the internal processes and initiatives to help the company accomplish its mission. [Our handbook](https://compass.nimblehq.co/) has been written by the whole team.

### Why it would be awesome to work with us
-   **You will be proud**  of any product that has our name on it.
-   We are an  **engineering-focused company**. Both co-founders are software engineers and led the tech teams at the most prominent e-commerce powerhouses in South East Asia.
-   We really pay attention and care about  **processes, high quality, and aesthetics**.
-   **Strong processes**. We not only believe but also really work following agile principles. Developers work on well-sized and well-defined user stories, do estimate using points and work iteratively in short sprints (1-2 weeks).
-   Regular one-on-one reviews to constantly  **improve and grow**. We have a clearly defined process for our developers to level up continuously not only their technical skills but also soft skills.
-   **The vast amount of learning resources**  (Pluralsight, Pragpub, Leanpub, (e-)books, etc.) and yearly education allowance to step up your game.
-   Private medical insurance (Liberty)  **from day one**, company care fund and social welfare coverage.
-   Great equipment consisting of a MacBook Pro, large screens, and any accessory to let you work comfortably. Our equipment is renewed every 3 years. If you already have a great laptop and wish to continue using, we will reimburse with a laptop allowance monthly.
-   Casual work attire for everyone.
-   Comfortable and modern office space environment in the heart of Ho Chi Minh city and Da Nang.
-   25 days of paid leaves/year (10 public holidays + 15 personal days).
-   Sabbatical month every 3 years.
-   Company outing every year.
-   Many more perks!
### Interesting engineering projects
Want to see what we have built? Check our [Dribbble](https://dribbble.com/nimblehq) and [Behance](https://www.behance.net/Nimblehq) accounts.
### Contact
Homepage: nimblehq.co
Contact: uyen@nimblehq.co (+84 989 781 874)

title: Nimble - Senior Web Developer (Ruby/JavaScript) - HCM/DN - FT
body:
## Location
You can choose one of our two locations:
* Ho Chi Minh city, Vietnam
* Da Nang, Vietnam

## Salary Expectation

* $1500-$3000/month

## Requirements
-   **5 or more years of professional web development experience**. Experience in Ruby, JavaScript or Go is ideal. If you do not have experience in these stacks, you must be open to learn and work on them. If you have advanced experience in PHP or Python, it would be easy for you to transition.
-   **Proven ability to lead large web projects end-to-end,** from front-end/back-end architecture to implementation and deployment.
-   At least basic experience with a modern JavaScript framework like React JS/Redux, Vue JS or Angular JS.
-   **Advanced experience in writing automated tests for web applications**.
-   Enjoy working on challenging solutions and systems.

title: Nimble - Technical Product Owner - HCM/DN - FT
body:
## Location

## Salary Expectation

* $1500-$3500/month

## Requirements
-   **4 years or more of professional experience in a similar role.**
-  Must have **professional software development experience**.
-  Degree in Computer Science or related fields is preferred.
-  Passion and experience in web and mobile applications, startups and cutting edge technology.
-  Not being afraid to roll up your sleeves to get things done.
-  Understanding of agile development.
-  High attention to details.
-  Ability to organize your own work and create work for others.
-  Looking for a leadership role, hence soft skills such as negotiation and evaluating/proposing creative alternatives are required.

title: Fetch - Frontend Developer (ReactJS) - HCM/HN - FT
body:
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/60914247/86430660-127b6780-bd1d-11ea-840a-22e02d92c2db.png)

# HCM/HN

# Range: 900 - 1,300 USD

## Requirements
* At least 2 years experiences of working as frontend developer.
* Proficient in React stack (ReactJS, Redux, State Management, Functional Programming).
* Expert knowledge with HTML5, CSS3, SASS/SCSS.
* Solid knowledge of modern web development technologies & framework based on JavaScript, HTML, CSS.
* Expert with developing responsive layouts leveraging CSS and media queries.
* Design and implement robust client-side solutions with RESTful API.
* Strong competency in responsive, mobile-first layouts leveraging CSS and media queries.
* Intermediate level of comprehension of the english language.

## Responsibilities

* Build new software front end for advanced user experience.
* Build reusable components/modules for static websites with responsive design.
* Work with API endpoints for dynamic content updating.
* Ensure UI/UX of developed pages and software with near pixel-perfect design.
* Develop and optimize front end UI to ensure the application is rendered consistently in cross-browser environments.
* Cooperate to connect front end software development with expert backend team.

## Why it would be awesome to work with us

* Working in a professional, friendly, well-equipped environment both with foreigners and Vietnamese.
* Extensive on job training, you will always have chance to work with new emerging technologies.
* Full social insurance, health insurance & unemployment insurance according to Vietnam Labor Law.
* 12-day annual leave per year.
* 13th month salary.
* Enjoy diversified activities: Happy time every day, Monthly Team-building, Company trip, Play Game (PlayStation, CS Go), Play Sport (Football, Badminton...).

## Contact
Mail: trangdong@fetch.tech
Skype: trangdong0111@gmail.com
